text:
Hey everyone! Today we're learning English 
with the biggest hits from Maroon 5.

By the way, in case you're new here, 
we help you to learn fast English

without getting lost, without missing the jokes 
and without subtitles. Just like Luke who says

that he passed his C1 Advanced English Exam 
thanks to our lessons. So be sure to hit that

subscribe button and the bell down below so 
that you don't miss any of our new lessons.

If you struggle to understand fast speaking 
natives then I highly recommend our Fluent

with Friends course. In this 48 week course you 
will learn with the first two seasons of Friends,

you'll receive pdf power lessons every 
week, vocabulary memorization software,

access to our Fluency Circle Global Community and 
so much more. And the best part is you can try it

right now for free with our 3-Part Masterclass. 
All you have to do is click up here or down in

the description box below to learn more and sign 
up now. We look forward to seeing you there.

If you're a fan of learning English 
with songs then I highly recommend

you check out this playlist where you'll 
find a great variety of lessons. You can

click up here or down in the description 
box below to choose your next lesson.
